SFS Monument

Date Spring 2019
Type Professional Internship
Office Project: Architecture
Role Parametric Design, Construction Documentation

This project transforms the courtyard of Seoul Foreign School into a dynamic environment centered around a pavilion-like monument and a series of modular furniture. The monument incorporates four shields that symbolize the school emblem's core icons—the book, the torch, the atom, and the cross—linked by wormhole-like mesh tunnels and topped with an interactive LED lighting system. Scattered across the courtyard, modular furnishings can be combined and rearranged to accommodate daily student life, lectures, stage performances, or casual gatherings, ensuring the outdoor space remains flexible and engaging.
